content: Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 Feb 2019How do I indicate bank transfers under my balance account as part of my expenditure in the report (for the seedly app)?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 09 Feb 2019Select the transaction you wish to changeClick on the change icon at the top left corner (below the icon)Choose a suitable catergory under 'Expenses'and there you have it!0 comments0
